base.name: deepce
author: Matthew Rollings,Integration to kubesploit Yaniv Yakobovich(@yanivyakobovich)
base.notes: Commands are run with /bin/bash -c . Use quotes if you want to run multiple commands or shell features such as redirection or pipeline

options.name: Parameter
options.description:
Parameters to add for the script 
 With Parameter set to "" the script with no Parameters which mean the regular scan will take place 
 set Parameter to --help and see all the possibilities

base.description: Docker Enumeration, Escalation of Privileges and Container Escapes (DEEPCE) visit https://github.com/stealthcopter/deepce for full details
